mapper.update: update db_ebaylimit set EBAYIDMANAGEID = #{ebayidmanageid,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, ACTIVITY = #{activity,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ITEMS = #{items,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, AMOUNT = #{amount,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, OPER = #{oper,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, OPERTIME = #{opertime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, CORPID = #{corpid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, OPENFLAG = #{openflag,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where SEQUENCEID = #{sequenceid,jdbcType=DECIMAL}
mapper.select: select SEQUENCEID, EBAYIDMANAGEID, ACTIVITY, ITEMS, AMOUNT, OPER, OPERTIME, CORPID, OPENFLAG from db_ebaylimit where SEQUENCEID = #{sequenceid,jdbcType=DECIMAL}
select SEQUENCEID, EBAYIDMANAGEID, ACTIVITY, ITEMS, AMOUNT, OPER, OPERTIME, CORPID, OPENFLAG from db_ebaylimit
